metadata.title: CVE-2021-25740 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A security issue was discovered with Kubernetes that could enable users to send network traffic to locations they would otherwise not have access to via a confused deputy attack.

notes.note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
